overview:
Rich Mironov is CEO of FUDCorp (in stealth), a serial entrepreneur, and software product management veteran.

Rich started as a software engineer (HP), came up through technical product management (Tandem, Sybase) and into executive product/marketing roles at startups including iPass and AirMagnet. He’s also consulted to dozens of companies independently and as CMO of Enthiosys.

He’s been blogging about software strategy, products and Silicon Valley organizations since 2001 (http://www.mironov.com/) and wrote “The Art of Product Management” in 2008. He’s been active in the agile community, chairing the product stage in 2009 and ‘10. Rich has a BS Physics from Yale with a thesis on dinosaur extinction theories, and an MBA from Stanford.
